resources.string: The mind was attracted by the taste of the holy names. Mostly full attention.
Repetition with the emotion of humility, the emergence of taste, enthusiasm.
Persistent efforts. A prayer of repentance, a search for humility.
Understanding distraction, effort in mindfulness despite different thoughts.
Absentmindedness. Sometimes there is an understanding of inattention. Short-term concentration. Case planning. The pursuit of mat. pleasures and achievements.
Complete indifference. Thoughts about material gains. Looking at things around. Very boring repetition.
Strong drowsiness, dullness, apathy, aversion to repetition.
